moves.name: Mirror Shot
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of lowering the target’s accuracy by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: X Defense
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Defense by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Stand Together!
moves.effect: Raises the Defense and Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.effect: This move’s power is doubled when the target’s Speed is raised.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP the first time it is in a pinch each battle.

passives.name: Quick Cure
passives.description: Removes the confused, flinching, and trapped conditions from the user the first time they are inflicted each battle.
